Transforming list to data frame

Source: R/zzz_CLOSED_FORM.R
CLOSED_FORM-cash-as_dataframe.Rd

This function transforms the result generated by gen to a data frame.

Arguments

dat

Vector or List. Results generated by gen method.

lhs

Character. The name of the expression. Default is ".lhs".

Value

A data frame.

Examples


# Constant variable
a <- 1

# Random uniform variable
b <- rand_uniform()

# Define a closed form expression
cf <- closed_form(~3 * (exp(a) + b))

# Generate data
result1 <- cf$gen(10)

cf$as_dataframe(result1)
#>         .lhs
#> 1   9.840010
#> 2  10.565303
#> 3   8.766076
#> 4   9.324772
#> 5  10.177465
#> 6   8.599008
#> 7   9.267913
#> 8   9.248825
#> 9  10.269853
#> 10 10.042071

# Generate data and keep the RHS
result2 <- cf$gen(10, rhs_val = TRUE)

# Specify the name
cf$as_dataframe(result2, lhs = "y")
#>            y          b
#> 1  10.861508 0.90222074
#> 2   9.620974 0.48870962
#> 3   9.921843 0.58899912
#> 4  10.689954 0.84503633
#> 5  10.215099 0.68675108
#> 6   9.433466 0.42620670
#> 7  10.314828 0.71999430
#> 8   9.537573 0.46090904
#> 9   8.285821 0.04365844
#> 10  9.498985 0.44804648
